MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G1 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:18am. Our engineers are currently onsite near the George Street substation investigating the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:03pm on Sunday, 10 January 2021
